text: "Sweet Loving Man" is a song by Brazilian singer Morris Albert. It was the follow-up to his international hit song, "Feelings" from his 1975 LP of the same name. During the winter of 1976, "Sweet Loving Man" peaked at number 93 on the Billboard Hot 100 and number 15 on the Adult Contemporary chart in the United States.
